title: On Some Integrable Generalisations of the Continuous Toda System
abstract: In the present paper we obtain some integrable generalisations of the continuous Toda system generated by a flat connection form taking values in higher grading subspaces of the algebra of the area--preserving diffeomorphism of the torus $T^2$, and construct their general solutions. The grading condition which we use here, imposed on the connection, can be realised in terms of some holomorphic distributions on the corresponding homogeneous spaces.
